hero.betaTag: Studio v1.3 • Auto-Apply pilot with 24 teams

title.suffix: and watch them land in production

description.primary: Codexonx Studio links AI actions to real delivery. Auto-apply turns suggestions into code patches in seconds, while the run log panel tracks every approval, revert, and deploy.
description.secondary: Secure workspace orchestration, key management, and decision journals live in one view so your team can see which recommendation shipped and why.

bullets: Auto-apply converts AI actions into merge-ready patches
Run log search highlights the journey from suggestion to deploy

stats.heading: Studio impact
stats.description: Pilot teams measure how auto-apply accelerates their ship cadence without losing control.

items.label: Avg. time from suggestion to deploy

description.lead: A next-generation platform for engineering teams.
description.detail: From planning to ship-ready code, unlock visibility and control throughout your lifecycle.

items.title: Auto-Apply Workflows
items.description: Apply AI-driven suggestions directly to branches, with Studio logging context, reviewers, and deploy status automatically.

items.title: Action Control Center
items.description: Give engineering, product, and security a shared timeline of which recommendation shipped, who approved it, and where it lives.

items.title: Run Log Intelligence
items.description: Search the run log with natural language to trace suggestions, rollbacks, and deploy outcomes in seconds.

items.title: Synchronized Workspaces
items.description: Keep Git, cloud deployments, and Slack channels aligned so every teammate shares the same live context.

trust.heading: Why teams trust Codexonx
trust.description: We co-design Studio with pilot squads so AI actions stay transparent and auditable.

items.title: GDPR & KVKK aligned
items.description: Process design follows EU and Turkish data protection standards, with dedicated tenant isolation for workspace data.

items.title: SOC 2 Type I in progress
items.description: Independent audit underway, run log retention and access journeys are already mapped for examiners.

items.title: Feedback from 18 pilot teams
items.description: Teams in Istanbul, Berlin, and London continuously shape the auto-apply and run log experience with weekly feedback.

integrations.heading: Ecosystem & Integrations
integrations.description: Connect every step of your delivery chain. Codexonx observes the journey from commit to live ops.

items.name: GitOps & PR Auto-merge
items.description: GitHub/GitLab integrations open auto-apply patches as PRs and orchestrate reviewer flows automatically.

items.name: Cloud Deploy Insights
items.description: Map Vercel and AWS rollouts back to the AI action that triggered them, right from the run log.

items.name: Team Notifications
items.description: Slack and Teams integrations broadcast applied actions, reversions, and risk alerts instantly.

testimonials.heading: What our pilot teams say
testimonials.description: Highlights from the teams co-building Codexonx with us.

items.quote: Auto-apply moves AI suggestions straight into code without bloating our backlog. The run log makes approvals and deploys auditable.
items.name: Selin Arda

items.quote: Run log search surfaces security exceptions in seconds. End-of-day reports land in Slack automatically.
items.name: Jorge Méndez

items.quote: Studio closed the loop between AI guidance and real deployments. We know exactly which suggestion became which release.
items.name: Ebru Kahvecioğlu

pricing.heading: Pricing Plans
pricing.subheading: Every plan includes Codexonx Studio auto-apply, run log, and secure workspace orchestration so you can scale with clarity.

currencyNotes.usd: USD values reference the daily CBRT average rate.
currencyNotes.eur: Euro conversions reflect EU customer guidance.

pricing.currencyDisclaimer: * Exchange rates are indicative and refreshed at billing time.

roi.free: Explore auto-apply and run log with limited workspaces and no credit card required.
roi.enterprise: We tailor pricing, SLAs, and auto-apply coverage around your governance needs and deployment footprint.
roi.team: Roughly {{formattedCost}} monthly for a {{teamSize}}-person squad. Auto-apply recaptures about 8 engineering hours per sprint.

starter.name: Starter
starter.tagline: An ideal launchpad for individual builders.

pro.name: Pro
pro.tagline: Automation and insights for growing squads.

enterprise.name: Enterprise
enterprise.tagline: Advanced security, dedicated SLAs, and on-prem options.

faq.question: Is the Starter plan truly free?
faq.answer: Yes. No credit card required and you stay on Starter unless you decide to upgrade.

faq.question: Who benefits most from the Pro plan?
faq.answer: Product and platform teams shipping daily. It includes automated rotation, 30-day logs, and priority support.

faq.question: How do Enterprise engagements work?
faq.answer: Pricing reflects the number of environments, compliance scope, and enablement needs. Most teams launch in 4-6 weeks.

cta.title: Connect AI actions to real product outcomes
cta.description: Codexonx Studio links auto-apply, run logs, and action dashboards so every recommendation has a traceable path to production.

footer.description: Future-proof your teams with secure pipeline management, workspace synchronization, and AI-guided code generation.
footer.tagline: Istanbul • Built for global product squads
